issue.title: [CF 1465] Brewmaster Monk Stagger Bar Tracker
issue.body:
Hey,

 

I use TMW for every spec I play in WoW.  My problem is that there is no way to make a bar fill to represent the correct amount of stagger.  Instead, it will only try to track the duration on the debuff for stagger.  Basically I would like to make a Brewmaster Monk Stagger bar identical to the standard Blizzard UI stagger bar except I can move it, change it's colours, postions etc. So, to sum up:  Can you implement Brewmaster Monk Stagger into the Resource Display section of a Bar group/icon?


> Posted by CurseForge user Markofmir | Imported from CurseForge issue #1465 | Raw

comments.body:
Don't want to come off as self promotional but although this functionality doesnt come backed in to TMW I've created an addon that extends that functionality into TMW - https://wow.curseforge.com/projects/tellmewhen_script_tools.

 

There is already an example there on how to implement the Normalized Stagger addon/WA in TMW, so you can base your own on from that example. 


> Posted by CurseForge user ariehg

Added in the latest version.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
